cast.name: 克里斯汀·莱曼 Kristin Lehman

introduction: 本片探讨的是电影和电视产业中女性所面对的尴尬现实，以及改变这种状况的必要性、可能性和实现的方式。以大众电视领域为背景——从刑侦片到情景喜剧、医院情景剧，以及网络连续剧，將一系列简短的戏谑模仿串联出完整的剧情故事，并以变革的决心作为收尾。Reel Women Seen tells the story of the realities faced by women in the film and TV industry yet simultaneously depicts the necessary, possible and achievable ways to transform them. Set in common TV backdrops – from police procedural to sitcom, to medical drama, to BTS webisode series. One continuous narrative unfolds through a series of brief parodies, ending with resolve for change. The project features an ensemble cast of women as widely diverse as imaginable.
